Plant Calculations¶

research_it.plant_calculations.C_stock(Q_plant, C_plant, pump_flow)[source]¶

This function calculates the stock concentration of a generic material given desired concentration in the plant. Parameters ———- Q_plant : float

flow rate of the plant
C : float
desired concentration of the material within the plant
tubing_color : string
color of the tubing to be used
float
maximum stock concentration (g/L)
>>> C_stock_max(7*u.mL/u.s, 100*u.NTU, "yellow-blue")
159.89684125188708 gram/liter
>>> C_stock_max(7*u.mL/u.s, 2*u.mg/u.L, "orange-yellow")
14.404039668326215 gram/liter
research_it.plant_calculations.ID_colored_tube(color)[source]¶

This function looks up the inner diameter (ID) of a Masterflex 3-stop tube given the color of its tags.

:param color : string
color of the tubing to be used
Return float:diameter of the tubing (mm) 
>>> ID_colored_tube("yellow-blue")
1.52 millimeter
>>> ID_colored_tube("orange-yellow")
0.51 millimeter
>>> ID_colored_tube("purple-white")
2.79 millimeter
research_it.plant_calculations.M_stock(Q_plant, C, tubing_color, V_stock)[source]¶

The mass of the material required to reach the desired stock concentration. Parameters ———- Q_plant : float

flow rate of the plant
C : float
desired concentration within the plant
tubing_color : string
color of the tubing to be used
V_stock : float
volume of the stock container
float
mass of material to be added to the stock container
>>> M_stock(7*u.mL/u.s, 100*u.NTU, "yellow-blue", 1*u.L)
159.89684125188708 gram
research_it.plant_calculations.Q_stock(Q_plant, C_plant, C_stock)[source]¶

This function calculates the flow rate of the stock of the desired concentration. Parameters ———- Q_plant : float

flow rate of the plant
C : float
desired concentration within the plant
tubing_color : string
color of the tubing to be used
float
flow rate of the stock (mL/s)
>>> Q_stock_max(7*u.mL/u.s, 100*u.NTU, "yellow-blue")
0.007442298363639224 milliliter/second
>>> Q_stock_max(7*u.mL/u.s, 2*u.mg/u.L, "orange-yellow")
0.0009719495587606109 milliliter/second
research_it.plant_calculations.Q_water(Q_plant, C_clay, C_pacl_min, tubing_clay, tubing_pacl)[source]¶

This function calculates the required flow rate for water from the tap for the experiment. Parameters ———- Q_plant : float

flow rate of the plant
C_clay : float
concentration of clay to be added, i.e. the desired influent turbidity
C_pacl_max : float
minimum coagulant dose of the mixed water in the flocculator
tubing_clay
color of the tubing to be used for the clay stock
tubing_clay
color of the tubing to be used for the PACL stock
float
required flow rate for water for the experiment if it were coming from a tap
>>> Q_water(7*u.mL/u.s, 100*u.NTU, 0.2*u.mg/u.L, "yellow-blue", "orange-yellow")
419.49514512465606 milliliter/minute
research_it.plant_calculations.T_stock(Q_plant, C, tubing_color, V_stock)[source]¶

This function calculates the time after the experiment at which the stock container will run out. Parameters ———- Q_plant : float

flow rate of the plant
C : float
desired concentration within the plant
tubing_color : string
color of the tubing to be used
V_stock : float
volume of the stock container
float
time before the stock is depleted (hr)
>>> T_stock(7*u.mL/u.s, 100*u.NTU, "yellow-blue", 1*u.L)
37.324192635827984 hour
>>> T_stock(7*u.mL/u.s, 2*u.mg/u.L, "orange-yellow", 1*u.L)
285.79443786361537 hour
research_it.plant_calculations.V_super_stock(Q_plant, C, tubing_color, V_stock, C_super_stock)[source]¶

The volume of super stock added to the stock container to reach the desired concentration within the plant. Parameters ———- Q_plant : float

flow rate of the plant
C : float
desired concentration within the plant
tubing_color : string
color of the tubing to be used
V_stock : float
volume of the stock container
C_super_stock : float
concentration of the super stock to be diluted down to the stock solution
float
volume of super stock to be added to the stock container
>>> V_super_stock(7*u.mL/u.s, 2*u.mg/u.L, "orange-yellow", 1*u.L, 69.4*u.g/u.L)
207.55100386637196 milliliter
research_it.plant_calculations.dilution_factor(C_stock, C_super_stock)[source]¶
C_stock : float
concentration of the stock solution connected to the pump
C_super_stock : float
concentration of the super stock solution from which stock is made
research_it.plant_calculations.pump_rpm(Q, tubing_color)[source]¶

This function calculates the RPMs required for a given flow rate and tube color. Parameters ———- Q : float

desired flow rate
tubing_color
color of the tubing to be used
float
revolutions per minute to set the pump to for the desired flow rate
>>> pump_rpm(0.01*u.mL/u.s, "yellow-blue")
4.031012804669423 rev/minute
research_it.plant_calculations.volPerRev_small(color)[source]¶

This function calculates the volume per revolution of a 6 roller pump given the tag colors of the Masterflex 3-stop tubing being used. The calculation was empirically derived using the table found at http://www.ismatec.com/int_e/pumps/t_mini_s_ms_ca/tubing_msca2.htm Parameters ———- color : string

color of the tubing to be used
float
flow from the 6 roller pump (mL/rev)

////////////TODO : change inputs to colors///////////////

>>> volPerRev_small(2.79*u.mm)
0.4005495805189351 milliliter/rev
>>> volPerRev_small(1.52*u.mm)
0.14884596727278446 milliliter/rev
>>> volPerRev_small(0.51*u.mm)
0.01943899117521222 milliliter/rev
